title: Classic Chocolate Cake
shortDesc: Rich, moist chocolate cake with creamy ganache frosting.
fullDesc: Our signature chocolate cake made with premium cocoa, layered with silky chocolate ganache. Perfect for birthdays and celebrations. Contains eggs, dairy, and gluten.

title: Strawberry Shortcake
shortDesc: Light vanilla sponge layered with fresh strawberries and cream.
fullDesc: Fluffy vanilla sponge cake filled with whipped cream and ripe Bangladeshi strawberries. Topped with strawberry glaze and mint. Best served chilled.

title: Red Velvet Cupcakes (6 pcs)
shortDesc: Velvety red cupcakes with cream cheese frosting.
fullDesc: Soft red velvet cupcakes topped with tangy cream cheese frosting and decorated with edible rose petals. Sold in packs of 6.

title: Mango Mousse Cake
shortDesc: Light mango mousse layered over sponge, topped with fresh mango.
fullDesc: Summer special! Smooth mango mousse with hints of cardamom, layered over vanilla sponge. Topped with fresh mango cubes and pistachios. No artificial flavors.

title: Black Forest Gateau
shortDesc: Chocolate sponge with cherries, whipped cream, and chocolate shavings.
fullDesc: Authentic Black Forest cake with layers of chocolate sponge, cherry compote, and whipped cream. Finished with dark chocolate curls.

title: Cheesecake Bites (12 pcs)
shortDesc: Mini New York-style cheesecakes with berry compote.
fullDesc: Creamy baked cheesecake bites on a buttery crust, drizzled with mixed berry compote. Pack of 12 — ideal for parties!

title: Rasmalai Cake
shortDesc: Fusion cake with rasmalai filling and saffron cream.
fullDesc: Bangladeshi twist on cake! Vanilla sponge filled with soft rasmalai pieces, soaked in sweetened milk, and topped with saffron-infused cream and pistachios.

title: Glazed Donuts (6 pcs)
shortDesc: Soft yeast donuts dipped in warm chocolate glaze with pistachio dust.
fullDesc: A sweet homage to Bengal! Fluffy yeast-raised donuts hand-dipped in warm chocolate glaze, finished with a sprinkle of crushed pistachios and edible rose petals. Slightly caramelized edges, melt-in-mouth texture. Best served fresh — perfect with cha or milk. Pack of 6.

title: Mango & Malai Tart (4 pcs)
shortDesc: Buttery tart shells filled with mango curd and whipped malai.
fullDesc: Summer special! Crisp shortcrust tarts filled with tangy Himsagar mango curd and topped with light whipped malai (fresh cream). Garnished with mango slices and mint. Pack of 4 — great for gifting!

title: Choco-Peanut Brownie Box
shortDesc: Fudgy brownies with peanut butter swirl and chocolate chunks.
fullDesc: Rich, fudgy brownies made with dark chocolate and local peanut butter, swirled with caramel and studded with roasted peanuts. Sold in a gift box of 8. Best enjoyed with tea or coffee. Contains nuts.
